name: Summer Camps
description: CMC offers summer camps for youth ages 8 - 12 to learn piano, guitar and singing, or for students ages 9 - 18 to play music with other students (Mariachi, Jazz, Latin, Classical).
fullDescription: CMC offers summer camps for youth ages 8 - 12 to learn piano, guitar and singing, or for students ages 9 - 18 to play music with other students (Mariachi, Jazz, Latin, Classical).
whatTheyOffer: CMC offers summer camps for youth ages 8 - 12 to learn piano, guitar and singing, or for students ages 9 - 18 to play music with other students (Mariachi, Jazz, Latin, Classical).
howToGetIt: https://sfcmc.org/play/summer-music-camps/ Please visit the website for specific instructions for each music camp.
cost: This is a fee-based service. Financial Aid is available.
